sentence.Network_en: He was epileptic and refused to take medication for his condition.
sentence.Network_cn: 他患有癫痫，但是拒绝服药治疗。

sentence.Network_en: About two in every five epileptic fits occur during sleep.
sentence.Network_cn: 每5例癫痫病中约有两例是在睡眠过程中发作的。

list.abs: ②癫痫性脑病 (epileptic encephalopathy)：是癫痫样放电本身导致进行性脑功能障碍疾病，如后天获得性癫痫性失语(ESES)，EEG显 …
而癫痫发作（Epileptic Seizure）是指脑神经元异常和过度超同步化放电所造成的临床现象。它是多种原因引起脑部神经元群阵发性异 …
epilepsy 癫痫epileptic state 癫痫持续状态epileptogenic focus 癫痫灶

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 17th cent.: from French épileptique, via late Latin from Greek epilēptikos, from epilēpsia (see epilepsy)

entry.def: Someone who is epileptic suffers from epilepsy.

example.ex: He was epileptic and refused to take medication for his condition.
example.tran: 他患有癫痫，但是拒绝服药治疗。

entry.def: An epileptic fit is caused by epilepsy.

example.ex: Paula had never seen an epileptic seizure.
example.tran: 葆拉从没见过有人癫痫发作。

means.word_mean: 1. of or relating to or characteristic of epilepsy;

auth_sentence.content: Occasionally people have epileptic fits when they come off.
auth_sentence.res_content: Occasionally people have epileptic fits when they come off.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Occasionally people have epileptic fits when they come off.

auth_sentence.content: We enlisted the help of several epileptic patients.
auth_sentence.res_content: We enlisted the help of several epileptic patients.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: We enlisted the help of several epileptic patients.

auth_sentence.content: It can also trigger epileptic fits in anyone who is prone to them.
auth_sentence.res_content: It can also trigger epileptic fits in anyone who is prone to them.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It can also trigger epileptic fits in anyone who is prone to them.
